description: Looking for a fruity, fizzy batch cocktail? Then this White Wine Ginger Beer&nbsp;Sangria is your perfect solution. This fun and refreshing drink looks spectacular in any pitcher, but tastes even better than what you would expect!It's full of bubbly soda water (or&nbsp;club soda) with just enough sparkling white wine mixed into it to make everything pop nicely without being too dry or tart on its own.
